content.raw:
I'm not sure which release caused the regression, but the pr2 is no longer working with dart. After inserting, all the links move to the origin. I'll try to track down the cause of this.

This is the source of a [pr2-related test failure](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any_dart4-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/62/testReport/junit/%28root%29/INTEGRATION_joint_screw/test_ran/), specifically a hang in `PhysicsEngines/JointTestScrew.ScrewJointLimitForce/3`.

~~~
185: [ RUN      ] PhysicsEngines/JointTestScrew.ScrewJointLimitForce/3
...
185: ODE Message 3: LCP internal error, s <= 0 (s=-8.6459e+47)
185: 
185: ODE Message 3: LCP internal error, s <= 0 (s=-2.5863e+127)
185: 
 37/110 Test #185: INTEGRATION_joint_screw ...............................***Timeout 240.03 sec
~~~

@jlee02
